title: Just lost 10 lp for dodging because the client glitched out, first dodge of the day wtf
body: I was in champ select and my client bugged out and disconected from chat, wasnt able to lock in a champ. I dont know why i lost 10 lp, i hadnt dodged any games for weeks. has this happened to anyone else? is there any chance of riot giving me my lp back? such a struggle getting out of bronze haha
